actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: A bill to provide authorizations for the Department of State, and for other purposes.
short_title: American Foreign Affairs Western Hemispheric Act

summary.text: American Foreign Affairs Western Hemispheric Act - States that the foreign affairs agencies should recognize the preeminence of relations which bind the United States of America to other countries and territories located geographically with it in the Western Hemisphere. Expresses the sense of Congress that because of this situation there should be located in the Department of State a Deputy Secretary for the Americas, responsible directly only to the Secretary of State.

titles.title: American Foreign Affairs Western Hemispheric Act
A bill to provide authorizations for the Department of State, and for other purposes.
